properties.name: Evironment for Incident while Execution of Playbook
Incident Title Condition
properties.description: Incident Title Condition. Enter the Value which is will be added to condition and same value needs to be used while creating incident.

Use Case -- This WF Needs to be run on Target named with "Playbook Target"
Create a Phase for all four Stages (Identification , Containment , Eradication and Recovery)
Create a Wf of Incident Response 
Create a task for playbook with wf id 
Create playbook and Publish
Assignment Rule with condition and map above playbook
Create a Incident which matches condition 
Go to response and execute Workflow

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

{
  "title": "Rule-Title-$activity.definition_activity_02CHZU3VR2D1M3lrTkCqKTRfGkCr7O13OUF.output.response_body$",
  "description": "Rule-Description--$activity.definition_activity_02CHZU3VR2D1M3lrTkCqKTRfGkCr7O13OUF.output.response_body$",

  $workflow.definition_workflow_02CHZSTLCFSZN3bYaQOfP2LjTbuZps6BYsb.input.variable_workflow_02CHZW8683OFY40aC7O1gvgSgTCYuTVQubp$

  "properties": {
    "group_by": true,
    "disabled": false,
    "rule_type": "rule_event",
    "title": "Rule-Title-$activity.definition_activity_02CHZU3VR2D1M3lrTkCqKTRfGkCr7O13OUF.output.response_body$",
    "description": "Rule-Description-$activity.definition_activity_02CHZU3VR2D1M3lrTkCqKTRfGkCr7O13OUF.output.response_body$",

  }
}
